籤詩版本二:
ʻOi aku ka waihoʻoluʻu o ka hau ma ka keke, a ʻo ka laki e lawe mai i ka laki a me ka pōmaikaʻi.
ʻAʻole pono e mihi ka poʻe o ia manawa no ka lilo ʻana i mea kaulana i ka hopena o ke ola ʻana a lilo i kaulana a puni ka honua i ka hāʻule hoʻokahi.
詩意:
ʻO kēia hexagram ka hau ma ka keke.
Laki maikaʻi i nā mea a pau.
解曰: Lilo ka mea kahiko i mea hou. Hoʻouna i nā mea i hoʻopau ʻia. No laila kona makemake ola. He hopena nā mea a pau.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liang Haodengke
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Scholar, Liang Hao (963-1004), ʻo Taisu, ma Xucheng, Yunzhou (ʻo Dongping, Shandong i kēia manawa) i ka Song Dynasty.
I ka wā e noho aliʻi ana ʻo Yongxi, ua hala ʻo ia i ka hoʻokolokolo Jinshi i ka makahiki ʻumikūmāwalu. ʻAʻole hāʻule ka hoʻomau ʻana i ka noi no ka hoʻokolokolo.
Ua hoʻomaka ʻo ia e lawe i ka hoʻokolokolo ma ke kolu o ka makahiki ʻo Tianfu. Ua hala ʻo ia i ka hōʻike i kēlā me kēia makahiki ma o ka Later Han Dynasty a me ka Later Zhou Dynasty, akā hāʻule i kēlā me kēia makahiki. Ua hoʻohiki ʻo ia ʻaʻole ʻo ia e hoʻokuʻikahi ke loaʻa ʻole iā ia ka makana mua.
I ka makahiki kanawalukūmālua, i ka makahiki ʻelua o Yongxi noho aliʻi ʻana o Emperor Zhenzong o ka Song Dynasty, ua lanakila ʻo ia i ka makana mua.
聖意: E pule no ka palekana o ka home (auspicious), palekana pilikino, loaʻa kālā, kālepa, male, Liujia kāne hele wāwae, Chitian silkworms, ʻewalu helu, ʻeono holoholona, ​​ʻimi i nā kānaka, nā hoʻopiʻi lehulehu, neʻe, nā waiwai nalowale, nā maʻi komohana ʻākau, Fushan grave pōmaikaʻi
